name: Trisz Divinis
overview: Trisz Divinis is a platform game. The player has been turned into a creep and thrown into the maze. His goal is to find the five herbs scattered through the labyrinth. Before the player will be able to collect the herbs he needs to find a pouch. The maze is inhabited by many hostile creatures and packed with many traps, contact with any of them means the loss of life. Besides the herbs the player must collect the keys to open the doors and the mirrors to go through the magic stones. The player may also encounter adding extra live power-ups.
